svg.title: üß© Puzzle.SVG

g.text: You can be a wallpainting restorator!
In the middle you have the version we found with basic correction.
In the middle you have the version we found with basic correction.
With posting the puzzle pice in the right place you restart this wallpainting!
Please open in browser to play!
You have solved the puzzle in

textarea.placeholder: You can paste/drop any image here.

div.label:
Fixed pattern
(may be harder depends on the image)

svg.script: const lang = [{ "vid1": "Four centuries of castle history", "vid2": "Wallpaintings reloaded", "puzzlegame": "Play! Restoration puzzle", "interationgame": "Use your fantasy! Interpretation game", "gametopic": "You can also be a mural painting restorer!", "subtitle": "We have already made the first step in the restoration process,", "subtitle0": " and uncovered the remains of the 17th century wallpainting from beneath many layers of plaster.", "conclude": "Now it's your turn to complete the picture with the missing details.", "gametopic2": "It still seems like a lot of missing details?", "gametopic20": "Well, according to the Venice Charter for the Conservation and Restoration of Monuments,", "gametopic21": "restoration must be carried out with respect to the original, and must stop at the moment where conjecture begins.", "subtitle2": "But this doesn't stop us from making our well documented assumptions on how the originals most probably looked like.", "conclude2": "The next level of the puzzle will reveal it to you!", "success1": "Congratulations, your painting is now restored!", "success11" : "While restorers worked for months on the orignal, it only took you .... minutes", "success2": "Great work! Now you know how old wallpaitings are being restored.", "success21" : "During this process of restoration and historical researching,", "success22" : "we also found out a lot of interesting stories about the life of the Daniels.", "successs23" : "Visit the rest of the exhibition to discover them." }, { "vid1": "Castelul Daniel - 4 secole de istorie", "vid2": "Fresco reloaded", "puzzlegame": "JoacƒÉ-te de-a restauratorul!", "interationgame": "Folose»ôte-»õi imagina»õia!", "gametopic": "Devino »ôi tu restaurator de picturi murale!", "subtitle": "Noi am fƒÉcut deja primele demersuri √Æn minu»õiosul proces de restaurare,", "subtitle0": "»ôi am √ÆndepƒÉrtat stratul gros de tencuialƒÉ aplicat de-a lungul secolelor peste suprafe»õele pictate din anii 1680.", "conclude": "Acum e r√¢ndul tƒÉu sƒÉ completezi imaginea.", "gametopic2": "√éncƒÉ »õi se pare cƒÉ sunt multe detalii lipsƒÉ?", "gametopic20": "Potrivit Cartei de la Vene»õia a ConservƒÉrii »ôi RestaurƒÉrii Monumentelor Istorice,", "gametopic21": "restaurarea trebuie sƒÉ se bazeze pe respectul materialului original, »ôi trebuie sƒÉ se opreascƒÉ acolo unde √Æncepe ipoteza.", "subtitle2": "Dar asta nu ne-a √Æmpiedicat sƒÉ avem ni»ôte ipoteze bine documentate despre cum arƒÉtau originalele.", "conclude2": "Po»õi descoperi »ôi tu, complet√¢nd urmƒÉtorul nivel al puzzle-ului.", "success1": "FelicitƒÉri, ai reu»ôit sƒÉ restaurezi fresca √Æn doar .... minute!", "success11" : "SƒÉ »ôtii cƒÉ restauratorii au migƒÉlit timp de mai multe luni pe originale.", "success2": "Bravo! Acum »ôti »ôi tu cum se restaureazƒÉ o frescƒÉ.", "success21" : "Dealungul procesului de restaurare »ôi de cercetare istoricƒÉ,", "success22" : "am descoperit multe pove»ôti interesante despre via»õa Danielilor.", "success23" : "VziteazƒÉ expozi»õia sƒÉ le descoperi »ôi tu." }, { "vid1": "A Daniel-kast√©ly 4 √©vsz√°zada", "vid2": "Falk√©pek √∫jrat√∂ltve", "puzzlegame": "J√°tsz restaur√°l√≥sdit!", "interationgame": "Vesd be a k√©pzel≈ëer≈ëd!", "gametopic": "L√©gy te is falfestm√©ny restaur√°tor!", "subtitle": "Mi m√°r elv√©gezt√ºk a fel√∫j√≠t√°si folyamat els≈ë l√©p√©seit,", "subtitle0": "√©s a sok r√©teg vakolat al√≥l, apr√≥l√©kos munk√°val felt√°rtuk a 17. sz√°zadi falk√©p maradv√°nyait.", "conclude": "Most rajtad a sor, retus√°ld a k√©pet.", "gametopic2": "√ögy t≈±nik, hogy m√©g mindig sok a hi√°nyoss√°g?", "gametopic20": "A m≈±eml√©kek konzerv√°l√°s√°ra √©s restaur√°l√°s√°ra vonatkoz√≥ Velencei Charta elveit k√∂vetve,", "gametopic21": "a fel√∫j√≠t√°s sor√°n tiszteletben kell tartani az eredeti alkot√°st, t√∂rt√©nelmi dokumentumok hi√°ny√°ban tilos az eredeti t√°rgy √∫jboli l√©trehoz√°sa.", "subtitle2": "De ez nem akad√°lyozott meg abban, hogy korabeli dokumentumok anal√≥gi√°ja alapj√°n megpr√≥b√°ljuk elk√©pzelni, hogy milyenek lehettek az olaszteleki falfestm√©nyek eredeti pomp√°jukban.", "conclude2": " A kirak√≥s k√∂vetkez≈ë szintj√©t megoldva te is megtudhatod.", "success1": "Gratul√°lunk, a falk√©ped restaur√°lva van!", "success11" : "Mig az eredetin h√≥napokig dolgoztak a restaur√°torok, neked alig ..... percbe tellett.", "success2": "Nagyszer≈± munka! Most m√°r te is tudod, hogyan restaur√°lj√°k a falfestm√©nyeket.", "success21" : "A fel√∫j√≠t√°si folyamat r√©sze az alapos t√∂rt√©neti kutat√°s is,", "success22" : " mely alatt sok √©rdekes t√∂rt√©netet fedezt√ºnk fel a Danielek √©let√©r≈ël.", "success23" : "N√©zd meg a ki√°ll√≠t√°s t√∂bbi r√©sz√©t, iskerkedj meg vel√ºk." }] var nodeLange = localStorage.getItem("langState") $(".comentTitle")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['gametopic'] $(".comentTitle1")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['subtitle'] $(".comentTitle10")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['subtitle0'] $(".comentTitle2")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['conclude'] console.log($("#success1")) $("#success1")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['success1'] $("#success11")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['success11']
